title: Family Reunion
itunes:title: Family Reunion
description:
Today on the show we had friend to the room Trae the Truth stop by here he cleared up domestic abuse allegations amid custody battle for his daughter and his car show with Dj Envy. Also, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to Calvin Ridley for betting on games, but also to the NFL for being partners with different sport betting platforms. Moreover Angela Yee helped some listeners out during "Ask Yee" with one caller having a family affair with a mother and daughter.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
